articles.title: Kyiv claims battlefield gains as Russian gas shutdown hits Europe markets - Reuters
articles.description: Ukraine made its boldest claim yet of success on the battlefield in its week-old counter-offensive against Russian forces in the south, while European markets reopened on Monday in free-fall after Russia kept its main gas pipeline to Germany shut.
